feat.value: Two brothers according to the flesh went to a monastery.
One of them was an ascetic.
The other was very obedient.
If the father told him to do something,
he did it.
because of his obedience.
But his ascetic brother was goaded by it.
He said to himself,
“I will test him
and I will see if he is obedient.”
He made his way to his father
and he said,
“Send my brother and me
and we will go to that place.”
And the father gave them permission.
Wishing to test him, the ascetic took him
and he went down beside the river.
In that place, there were many crocodiles.
And he said to him,
“Go down to the river and pass through.”
So he went
and the crocodiles came
and they crushed his body.
And they did not hurt him at all.
When the ascetic saw, he said,
“Come out of the river.”
And as they were walking,
they found a body lying in the road.
And the ascetic said,
“If you have an [old thing]
let us throw it over him.”
The one who had obedience said,
“Let us pray for him instead.
Perhaps he will arise.”
